name: Product design career path
description: About the templateAre you a Product Designer looking to take control of your career path and achieve your professional goals? The Career Path Tracking Template for Notion has everything you need to track your progress, stay organized, and stay motivated!With this template, you'll get access to a range of features designed specifically for product designers.What's inside?â†’ Levels & Skills Evaluation: This customizable feature allows you to evaluate your skills based on your company's expectat
features: After purchasing the template, you will be redirected to Notion.; Click on the "Duplicate" button located in the top right corner. This will duplicate the template to your Notion workspace.; Congratulations! You can now start using the template and make all the adjusments needed to fit your needs.
